verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:3
verses.text: And Absalom said unto him, See, thy matters are good and right; but there is no man deputed of the king to hear thee.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:4
verses.text: Absalom said moreover, Oh that I were made judge in the land, that every man which hath any suit or cause might come unto me, and I would do him justice!

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:5
verses.text: And it was so, that when any man came nigh to him to do him obeisance, he put forth his hand, and took him, and kissed him.
